name: Brain Training VR
description:
VR Project realized for the subject Intelligence, Reality and Virtuality in La Salle, Universitat Ramon Llull, created with Unreal Engine and with the team:

Pau Medina - Art

Andres Luengo - Developer

David Segui - Developer

Joan Lluis Mudarra - Game Design

The download contains a short Gameplay video and the GDD 

Thanks!
